## ITeamParams.freeTeamMinPlayers property

\[自由数量的队伍\] 指定每支队伍的最少玩家数, 同时还需要指定 freeTeamMaxPlayers

**Signature:**

```typescript
freeTeamMinPlayers?: number;
```
